name: Daniel Ethan
comment: I bought it 5months ago and it really really leveled up me from my ex camera i had . I felt that profrsional feeling of being a profesional photographer.

name: George Aaron
comment: I've owned this camera for about six months now. I primarily use it to film Youtube video. It works well and no problem in manual mode.

name: Jason Kiefer
comment: I saved up for this camera for a while, after owning a Canon EOS 1100D and I never regretted it! Exceptional quality and so easy to create amazing looking photos.

name: Jaxon Jake
comment: I use this camera for shooting videos . This camera is very simple yet effective . And i enjoy using this camera . I am thinking of buying one for my self .

name: Jayden Leo
comment: I just love this camera I have improved my images immensely and am having so much fun .

name: Joshua Oscar
comment: I bought this camera and are satisfied with the pictures but I don't know what to do when they say that the card's write protect switch is set to lock can you help me?
